docs.title: Personal Ledger Backend Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for the Personal Ledger Backend.

This is a Rust-based backend server using Tonic for gRPC services.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
• Technology Stack: Rust, Tonic (gRPC), PostgreSQL (assumed)
  • Purpose: Manage personal financial ledgers via gRPC APIs

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository
  2. Set up Rust environment
  3. Run the server
  4. Access gRPC endpoints

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.text:
See API Documentation for detailed gRPC service definitions.

Local testing: Run mkdocs serve

docs.title: API Documentation
docs.text: This section will contain the gRPC API definitions and usage examples.

docs.title: Services
docs.text:
• LedgerService: Handles ledger operations
  • UserService: Manages user accounts
